description: Listed Building Consent: Installation of new One Person Operations (OPO) cameras, brackets and associated works with retention and eventually removal of existing OPO cameras, brackets and associated works
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Notwithstanding the plans, the new cameras and stands should match the colour of the curved cameras.&nbsp;</span></span></p><p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the listed building.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, the cables, cable management system and switch boxes are to be conditioned to match the colour of the surface to which they are attached. They shall then be retained and maintained as such thereafter.</span></span></p><p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the listed building.</span></span></p>

<div><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">The works hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.</span></span></div><div><p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">REASON: &nbsp;To comply with the provisions of Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990.</span></span></p></div>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Redundant modern equipment, including that no longer needed in 2027, is to be gently removed from site and affected fabric made good within 3 months of no longer being required.</span></span></p><p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the listed building.</span></span></p><p><br data-cke-eol="1"></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">All new external and internal works and finishes and works of making good to the retained fabric shall match the existing adjacent work with regard to the methods used and to material, colour, texture and profile, unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved or required by any conditions(s) attached to this consent.<br>REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the listed building.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">If previously unknown evidence is discovered about historic character which would be affected by the works hereby granted, an appropriate record, together with recommendations for dealing with it in the context of the scheme, shall be approved in writing by the local planning authority before any of the permitted works are begun. The works shall be completed in accordance with the approved details.<br>REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the listed building.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Suitable precautions shall be taken to secure and protect features against accidental loss or damage during the building work hereby granted, and no such features may be disturbed or removed, temporarily or permanently, except as indicated on the approved drawings or with the prior approval in writing of the local planning authority.<br>REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the listed building.</span></span></p>
